text: 7.22: 1 Ko 13.2Zumgum Fhe Bakɨme za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv mbe suanga tuga bakɨmen, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve khaŋ na suanga, ‘Bakɨme, Bakɨme, nza ndu zɨn panan ndu kamthooŋ guma ŋgari ŋaara muuŋgi. Nza vhɨra ndu zɨn panan ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi ga vharvharagi. Nza vhɨra ndu zɨn panan mirikori vhɨrve ga muuŋgi.’
